alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Decatur; Norton; Rawlins; Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 2:32AM CST until January 19 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulation ranging anywhere from 3 to 8 inches. Northerly winds at 15 to 25 mph may gust up to 35 mph at times. * WHERE...Portions of east central Colorado and northwest Kansas. * WHEN...From 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ this afternoon to 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions are expected along the Interstate 70 corridor in eastern Colorado and northwest Kansas late this evening into Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing and drifting snow may persist even after snowfall has ended.
info.instruction: Consider alternate travel plans. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne; Decatur; Norton; Rawlins; Sherman; Thomas
